long_description: The Osprey Rev Solo Hydration Waistpack is a technical, lumbar-style water bottle sling designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts and athletes who cover long distances quickly. Clear-cover zippered touchscreen smartphone pocket for protected and quick access. Small zippered stretch-mesh pocket on the belt. Hydraulics(TM) BPA-free sports bottle with 600ml capacity. Osprey Rev Solo Hydration Waistpack has an adjustable belt.
short_description: The Osprey Rev Solo Hydration Waistpack is a technical, lumbar-style water bottle sling designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts and athletes who cover long distances quickly.
